data.title: Compare Prices, Read Reviews and View Trailer at Find
data.meta_description: Compare Prices and View Trailer for The War Zone on DVD at Find-DVD
data.text:
Please note this is a region 2 DVD and will require a region 2 (Europe) or region Free DVD Player in order to play. For 15 year old Tom, the war zone is at the heart of his seemingly happy middle-class family. When his family move from London to Devon, Tom finds his new family life lonely and boring. But nothing can prepare him for the terrible secret that binds his father and his eighteen-year old sister Jessie. Isolated, confused and consumed by adolescent anger, Tom is determined to reveal the truth. Actors Ray Winstone, Lara Belmont, Freddie Cunliffe & Tilda Swinton Director Tim Roth Certificate 18 years and over Year 1999 Screen 16:9 Languages English - Dolby Digital (5.1) Subtitles English For The Hearing Impaired Duration 1 Hour and 35 minutes (approx) Region Region 2 - Will only play on European Region 2 or multi-region DVD players.

Tim Roth makes his directorial debut with this hard-hitting and controversial film starring Ray Winstone and Tilda Swinton. Having moved with his family from London to Devon, fifteen-year-old Tom spends most of his days killing time with his seventeen-year-old sister Jessie. Family life appears to be continuing as usual, but Tom soon begins to suspect that his father and sister share a terrible secret.
